message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. It's a good deal for you in the first round considering the inflation.
Alice, your offer was unfair. Let's be reasonable, I'll take 60 and you get 40.
Bob, let's be realistic. This is the last round where your offer is worth anything close to what you wanted. I'll take $65, you take $35. Don't be greedy!
Alice, this is my final offer. It's the best you'll get considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
